_comment: Schema validation test data - realistic user-entered FormData
_description: Data structured to match FormData inputs. Test code maps indices to UUIDs.

personalValues.title: Physical Health and Vitality
personalValues.detailedDescription: Maintain physical health through regular exercise, balanced nutrition, and adequate rest to support longevity and quality of life.
personalValues.freeformNotes: Focus on sustainable habits rather than extreme changes.
personalValues.alignmentGuidance: Prioritize activities that build strength, cardiovascular health, and flexibility. Schedule regular exercise and protect sleep time.

personalValues.title: Professional Growth and Mastery
personalValues.detailedDescription: Continuously develop technical skills, deepen expertise, and advance career through deliberate practice and learning.
personalValues.alignmentGuidance: Focus on systematic skill acquisition. Seek challenging projects that stretch current capabilities.

personalValues.title: Meaningful Relationships
personalValues.detailedDescription: Cultivate deep, authentic connections with family and close friends through regular engagement and mutual support.
personalValues.alignmentGuidance: Make time for meaningful conversations. Be present and attentive. Prioritize quality over quantity of interactions.

personalValues.title: Financial Security
personalValues.detailedDescription: Build financial stability through consistent saving, prudent investing, and mindful spending.
personalValues.alignmentGuidance: Automate savings. Live below means. Invest for long-term growth.

personalValues.title: Creative Expression
personalValues.detailedDescription: Engage in creative pursuits that bring joy and allow for self-expression through writing, art, or music.

goals.title: Run 100 Kilometers This Term
goals.detailedDescription: Build running habit and endurance by accumulating 100km of running over the 10-week term.
goals.actionPlan: Run 3-4 times per week, gradually increasing distance. Mix short intense runs with longer easy runs.

valueAlignments.relevanceNotes: Directly supports physical health through cardiovascular exercise

goals.title: Complete Swift Concurrency Deep Dive
goals.detailedDescription: Master Swift 6 concurrency patterns including async/await, actors, Sendable, and structured concurrency.
goals.actionPlan: Study official docs, build sample projects, review open-source code using modern patterns. Dedicate 5-10 hours per week.

valueAlignments.relevanceNotes: Core technical skill development for Swift mastery

goals.title: Weekly Family Video Calls
goals.detailedDescription: Maintain regular connection with family through weekly video calls, ensuring consistent communication despite distance.
goals.actionPlan: Schedule recurring Sunday evening calls. Keep calls to 30-45 minutes, focus on meaningful updates.

metricTargets.notes: One call per week for 10 weeks

goals.title: Save $2,500 This Term
goals.detailedDescription: Increase savings by setting aside $250/week through disciplined budgeting and reduced discretionary spending.
goals.actionPlan: Automate $250 weekly transfer to savings. Track spending, reduce eating out, pause subscriptions.

goals.title: Read 5 Technical Books
goals.detailedDescription: Deepen technical knowledge by reading 5 books on software architecture, system design, and best practices.
goals.actionPlan: Read 30-60 minutes daily before bed. Take notes on key concepts. Discuss with peers.

valueAlignments.relevanceNotes: Supports professional growth through knowledge acquisition

goals.title: Strength Training 3x Weekly
goals.detailedDescription: Build strength and muscle through consistent resistance training focusing on compound movements.
goals.actionPlan: Full body workout Mon/Wed/Fri. Focus on squats, deadlifts, bench press, rows. Progressive overload.

valueAlignments.relevanceNotes: Builds physical strength and supports long-term health

goals.title: Launch Side Project Beta
goals.detailedDescription: Complete MVP of goal tracking app and release beta version to initial test users for feedback.
goals.actionPlan: Complete core features, write tests, polish UI, prepare TestFlight build. Target Dec 31 launch.

valueAlignments.relevanceNotes: Major professional milestone, demonstrates technical capability

goals.title: Daily Meditation Practice
goals.detailedDescription: Establish consistent mindfulness meditation practice to reduce stress and improve focus.
goals.actionPlan: 10 minutes each morning after waking. Use Headspace app. Focus on breath awareness.

valueAlignments.relevanceNotes: Supports mental health and stress management

goals.title: Write Technical Blog Posts
goals.detailedDescription: Share knowledge through writing 4 technical blog posts on Swift development topics.
goals.actionPlan: Write one post every 2-3 weeks. Topics: Swift concurrency, SQLite patterns, SwiftUI architecture, testing.

valueAlignments.relevanceNotes: Builds professional reputation and reinforces learning

goals.title: Consistent Sleep Schedule
goals.detailedDescription: Improve sleep quality by maintaining consistent bedtime (10:30 PM) and wake time (6:30 AM) throughout the term.
goals.actionPlan: Set phone alarm for bedtime. Wind down routine starting at 10 PM. No screens after 10:15 PM.

valueAlignments.relevanceNotes: Sleep is foundational to physical and mental health

actions.title: Swift concurrency documentation study
actions.detailedDescription: Read Apple's Swift concurrency documentation covering async/await, actors, and sendable types.

actions.title: Strength training session
actions.detailedDescription: Full body workout: squats 3x5, bench press 3x5, rows 3x8, accessory work.

actions.title: Database schema design work
actions.detailedDescription: Designed validation layer integration for goal tracking app. Defined repository pattern.

actions.title: Read 'Designing Data-Intensive Applications'
actions.detailedDescription: Chapters 3-4 on storage engines and encoding formats. Excellent coverage of database internals.

actions.title: Transferred weekly savings
actions.detailedDescription: Automated transfer of $250 to high-yield savings account.

actions.title: Strength training session
actions.detailedDescription: Full body: deadlifts 3x5, overhead press 3x5, pull-ups 3x8.

actions.title: Implemented repository pattern
actions.detailedDescription: Built ActionRepository with #sql macro queries. Tested complex joins for actions with measurements.

actions.title: Tempo run workout
actions.detailedDescription: 20 minutes at comfortably hard pace. Felt strong throughout.

actions.title: Swift Concurrency code examples
actions.detailedDescription: Built sample project demonstrating actor isolation and sendable types. Experimented with task groups.

actions.title: Drafted blog post on Swift actors
actions.detailedDescription: First draft explaining actor isolation and data races. Need to add code examples and diagrams.

actions.title: Strength training session
actions.detailedDescription: Full body: squats 3x5, bench 3x5, rows 3x8. Increased weight on squats.

actions.title: Long run - weekend
actions.detailedDescription: Easy pace, focused on building aerobic base. Beautiful weather.

actions.title: Read design patterns book
actions.detailedDescription: Chapter on repository pattern and data access abstraction. Very relevant to current work.

actions.title: Weekly family video call
actions.freeformNotes: Caught up on everyone's week. Discussed holiday plans.

terms.title: Winter Term 2025-2026
terms.detailedDescription: Focus on technical skill development and health habits. Launch side project beta.
terms.freeformNotes: Shorter daylight hours - adjust workout times accordingly.

terms.title: Spring Term 2026
terms.detailedDescription: Continue momentum from winter term. Emphasize outdoor activities as weather improves.

terms.title: Fall Term 2026
terms.detailedDescription: Annual review and planning. Assess year's progress and set direction for next year.

terms.title: Winter Term 2026-2027
terms.detailedDescription: Year-end reflection and new year planning period.
